result.arabic_text: فَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَا وَهِيَ ظَالِمَةٞ فَهِيَ خَاوِيَةٌ عَلَىٰ عُرُوشِهَا وَبِئۡرٖ مُّعَطَّلَةٖ وَقَصۡرٖ مَّشِيدٍ
result.translation: 45. Magaalol marak magide finqisneeh usun korosuh anuk, tokkel ken dabooqa amook afah Raddeeh, buruurukumteeh foyyah keenik raqte, kaadu ken qelwa dubuk keenik Raqteeh, araktam matanaay, ken qarway fayyata soolol keenik raqteeh, digaalá keenik mawaasinna.
